name: inContactPerfmonPulsePlugin
description: Extracts InContact metrics from Windows Performance Counters

paramSchema.title: Name
paramSchema.name: displayName
paramSchema.description: The 'Name' that will be stored in Pulse for this metric.

paramSchema.title: Short Name
paramSchema.name: displayNameShort
paramSchema.description: The 'Short name' that will be stored in Pulse for this metric.

paramSchema.title: Identifier
paramSchema.name: name
paramSchema.description: The 'Identifier' that will be stored in Pulse for this metric.

paramSchema.title: Description
paramSchema.name: description
paramSchema.description: The 'Description' that will be stored in Pulse for this metric.

paramSchema.title: Unit
paramSchema.name: unit
paramSchema.description: The 'Unit' that will be stored in Pulse for this metric.

paramSchema.title: Default Aggregate
paramSchema.name: defaultAggregate
paramSchema.description: When graphing (or grouping at the 1 second interval) the aggregate function that makes most sense for this metric. Can be sum, avg, max, or min.

paramSchema.title: Default Resolution
paramSchema.name: defaultResolutionMS
paramSchema.description: How often you want to collect this performance counter (in milliseconds). Default: 1000

paramSchema.title: Counter Path
paramSchema.name: counter_path
paramSchema.description: The full path to the windows performance counter to collect.

paramSchema.title: Multiplier
paramSchema.name: multiplier
paramSchema.description: A decimal value to multiply the counter value by. Default: 1
